fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-in the day; you will publicly announce who you will be visiting tonight in the form Ill be "giving my life to [name] tonight"
-at night you'll bodyguard them
-you can also annoucne you will be visiting yourself to gain a basic defense (single use)
attributes:
-its pmuch the same as bg but your target is now preformed in the day
